rules_text:
Reach, trample
Improve {1{B}G} [i]({1{B}G}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. This costs {1} more to activate for each +1/+1 counter on it. Improve only as a sorcery.)[/i]
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Gorganith, Ruin Maw, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a creature card with mana value equal to or less than the number of +1/+1 counters on Gorganith and put it onto the battlefield. If you search your library this way, shuffle.
